<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header">object::coff&#95;bigobj&#95;file&#95;header</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.data() +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                                  CurPtr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify that we are dealing with bigobj.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (COFFBigObjHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header/#a2f8e42c1b21e9abb27b8c942ff0e1b65">Version</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coff/bigobjheader/#ad65c26a9ca959e73682acb723a9a963da35098a5e6c71482140d6a477ec7f56ea">COFF::BigObjHeader::MinBigObjectVersion</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">        std::memcmp(COFFBigObjHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header/#ac2267ccdeeee2d351106b7b02db1959a">UUID</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae89cd5cd0f88610c3b724d104f6f0fd8">COFF::BigObjMagic</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">      COFFHeader = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurPtr += </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header">object::coff&#95;bigobj&#95;file&#95;header</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
